title: 01/18/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/18/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's game between the Rams and Cardinals. Is Kliff Kingsbury the right guy to lead the Cardinals? Former Running back and Rams Color Analyst Maurice Jones-Drew calls in to discuss Los Angeles' chances going forward in the playoffs. And Steelers TJ Watt talks about his award winning season and whether Big Ben has told the team if he's retiring.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
